scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean; npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy_nft:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_nft.js
scripts.deploy_nft:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_nft.js
scripts.deploy_sm:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_shard_manager.js
scripts.deploy_sm:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_shard_manager.js
scripts.deploy_rf:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_rf.js
scripts.deploy_rf:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_rf.js
scripts.deploy_gp:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_gp.js
scripts.deploy_gp:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_gp.js
scripts.deploy_xrouter:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_xrouter.js
scripts.deploy_xrouter:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_xrouter.js
scripts.deploy_ctoken:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_ctoken.js
scripts.deploy_ctoken:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_ctoken.js
scripts.deploy_xbasket:mainnet: NETWORK=mainnet npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy_xbasket.js
scripts.deploy_xbasket:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_xbasket.js
scripts.deploy_usdc:rinkeby: NETWORK=rinkeby npx hardhat run --network rinkeby scripts/deploy_usdc.js
